mapper.select: select MAX(id) as id,user_id,post_id,MAX(Isdefault) as Isdefault from blade_post where user_id = #{userId} and Isdefault=1 GROUP BY user_id,post_id

SELECT DISTINCT xiaji.id FROM blade_dept shangji, blade_dept xiaji WHERE xiaji.tree_code LIKE CONCAT(shangji.tree_code,'%') AND xiaji.is_deleted = 0 AND xiaji.extend_type='岗位' and shangji.id=#{deptId}
mapper.update: update blade_post set Isdefault=0 where user_id=#{userId}; update blade_post set Isdefault=1 where user_id=#{userId} and post_id=#{postId}
